channel.title: Sorry for re-post .. but this one better
channel.description:
I need a link or the code for normal magic and/or ancients, because my normal magic only works on people, but only hits 0's on them, same applies with attacking npcs. Ancient magic is also the same, it only hits 0 on players and also only 0 on monsters, only ice barrage seems to work on people.
could someone please help me fix it, or atleast give me a link that would help me deal with the problem
i need a fix for ancient on players , and also need a fix for normal magic on monsters

item.title: Sorry for re-post .. but this one better

item.description:

you’ll have to add the spells i might be able to find them for you in client.java

aw sorry dw
